doc:
John Stephenson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Stephenson_(actor) 0 John Winfield Stephenson (August 9, 1923 – May 15, 2015) was an American actor, most active in voice-over roles. He has also been credited as John Stevenson. Stephenson never gave any interviews and was rarely seen in public, although he did make an appearance at BotCon 2001. John_Winfield_Stephenson ( August_9_,_1923 – May_15_,_2015 ) was an_American_actor , most_active in voice-over_roles . He has_also_been_credited as John_Stevenson . Stephenson never gave any_interviews and was_rarely_seen in public , although he did_make an_appearance at BotCon_2001 .
